mapper.insert: INSERT INTO destination(destinationno, recipient, recipient_phone, postcode, address1 ,address2, memno) VALUES(destination_seq.nextval, #{recipient}, #{recipient_phone}, #{postcode}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{memno})
mapper.select: SELECT destinationno, recipient, recipient_phone, postcode, address1 ,address2, basic, memno FROM destination WHERE memno=#{memno} ORDER BY destinationno ASC
